title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Mathematical Instruction Design for Optimizing Working Memory

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational mathematical concepts and general computer literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthens mathematical problem-solving skills in VR simulations mimicking authentic professional settings.

learning_goals: Learners can apply step-by-step strategies to solve complex mathematical problems within working memory capacity limits
Learners can efficiently process visual/auditory information provided in VR environments to optimize cognitive load
Learners can diagnose individual cognitive load factors and adjust learning strategies by analyzing formative assessment results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
